titleInfo.title: Is There a Way Beyond Fundamentalism? Challenges for Faith Development and Religious Education
The Fourth R for the Third Millennium: Education in Religions and Values for the Global Future

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Streib, H. (2001). Is There a Way Beyond Fundamentalism? Challenges for Faith Development and Religious Education. In L. J. Francis, J. Astley, & M. Robbins (Eds.), The Fourth R for the Third Millennium: Education in Religions and Values for the Global Future (pp. 177-199). Dublin: Lindisfarne Books.
